meanings.definition: To promote or sell goods or services
meanings.sent1: The store merchandized its products by placing them at the front of the store.
meanings.sent2: She merchandized her handmade crafts at the local market.
meanings.sent3: The talking robot merchandized the idea of friendship in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: His smile merchandized happiness to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display merchandized the beauty of the season.

meanings.definition: The act of buying and selling goods for profit
meanings.sent1: The merchandized items were flying off the shelves during the sale.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the thrill of merchandized transactions in the bustling market.
meanings.sent3: The cat's merchandized collection of toys was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: His room looked like a merchandized treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The market was a sea of merchandized goods waiting to be explored.
